.. _code-structure:

==============
Code Structure
==============

Ciw is structured in an object orientated manor.


.. image:: ../_static/codestructure.svg
   :scale: 100 %
   :alt: Code structure for Ciw.
   :align: center

The classes that make up Ciw are:

- Simulation
- Arrival Node
- Exit Node
- Node
- Server
- Individual
- Data Record
